{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":106221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よ、よう、ねーちゃん可愛いな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-Hey, sis, you're cute.\""},{"lineNumber":106222,"originalJapaneseLine":"　茶ァしばきにいかないか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wanna go have some tea?\""},{"lineNumber":106223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":106224,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうじゃのう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Well then.\""},{"lineNumber":106225,"originalJapaneseLine":"　時には貴様と茶を飲むのも悪くないかものう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Sometimes, drinking tea with you might not be so bad...\""},{"lineNumber":106226,"originalJapaneseLine":"「と言うとでも思ったか、たわけー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Did you really think I'd say that, fool!\""},{"lineNumber":106227,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お断りじゃ！　ばぁーか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I refuse! Idiot!\""},{"lineNumber":106228,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いだだだ！　なんじゃ、髪の毛引っ張るな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ouch, ouch! What the heck, don’t pull my hair!\""},{"lineNumber":106229,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ね、ねーちゃん可愛いな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...H-Hey, sis, you’re cute.\""},{"lineNumber":106230,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うむ……茶ァしばきにいかないか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... wanna go have some tea?\""},{"lineNumber":106231,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、構いませんよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, I don’t mind.\""},{"lineNumber":106232,"originalJapaneseLine":"「総統にはそれはもう、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To the Supreme Commander, I have so,"},{"lineNumber":106233,"originalJapaneseLine":"　沢山、沢山、沢山言いたいことがあります。","translatedEnglishLine":"many, many, many things I want to say."},{"lineNumber":106234,"originalJapaneseLine":"　むしろ望むところです」","translatedEnglishLine":"I actually welcome it.\""},{"lineNumber":106235,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、早く行きましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, let's go quickly.\""},{"lineNumber":106236,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、いい、いい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, no, no...\""},{"lineNumber":106237,"originalJapaneseLine":"　う、腕を掴むなー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"D-Don't grab my arm!\""},{"lineNumber":106238,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐはっ……こ、この俺が全敗……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... I-I’ve lost all rounds...\""},{"lineNumber":106239,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そもそもなんで知り合いしかおらんのだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why is it that there are only people I know here?!\""},{"lineNumber":106240,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ、せめて香ちゃんとかアールコートちゃんが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn, if only Ka-chan or Arcourt-chan"},{"lineNumber":106241,"originalJapaneseLine":"　通ってきてくれれば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"would come by at least...\""},{"lineNumber":106242,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっふっふっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fufufu...\""},{"lineNumber":106243,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はぁーーっはっはっはっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha—ha ha ha!\""},{"lineNumber":106244,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今、すっごくいい気分です！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Right now, I feel absolutely great!\""},{"lineNumber":106245,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐぬぬぬぬぬぬ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gunununununu...\""},{"lineNumber":106246,"originalJapaneseLine":"　も、もう怒りすら湧いてこない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I don’t even feel anger anymore...\""},{"lineNumber":106247,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おっ……あれは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh... that is...\""},{"lineNumber":106248,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、見ていろ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, just watch,"},{"lineNumber":106249,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺の本当の実力を見せてやる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll show you my true power!\""},{"lineNumber":106250,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":106251,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よう、ねーちゃん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, sis.\""},{"lineNumber":106252,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、ランス様、お散歩ですか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Lord Rance, are you out for a walk?"},{"lineNumber":106253,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私もそろそろお使いが終わりそうなので――」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m about to finish my errand too—\""},{"lineNumber":106254,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなことより、ねーちゃん可愛いな、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More importantly, sis, you’re cute,"},{"lineNumber":106255,"originalJapaneseLine":"　茶ァでもしばきに行かないか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"wanna go have some tea or something?\""},{"lineNumber":106256,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh...\""},{"lineNumber":106257,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――え」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—Eh?\""},{"lineNumber":106258,"originalJapaneseLine":"「か、可愛い……！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"C-Cute...!?\""},{"lineNumber":106259,"originalJapaneseLine":"ボッ！","translatedEnglishLine":"*Blush!*"},{"lineNumber":106260,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィルの顔が真っ赤に。","translatedEnglishLine":"Shir's face turned bright red."},{"lineNumber":106261,"originalJapaneseLine":"リンゴーン。リンゴーン。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ding dong. Ding dong."},{"lineNumber":106262,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、シィルの頭の中で結婚式の鐘が鳴っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Right now, the wedding bells were ringing in Shir's head."},{"lineNumber":106263,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おい、どうした？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-Hey, what's wrong?\""},{"lineNumber":106264,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ああ……ランス様に、そんな、そんな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ahh... from Lord Rance, such, such...\""},{"lineNumber":106265,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぽろぽろぽろー」","translatedEnglishLine":"*Sobbing sounds*"},

{"lineNumber":106266,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわ、泣き出した！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, she started crying!\""},

{"lineNumber":106267,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、お茶ですね、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, tea, right,"},

{"lineNumber":106268,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えへへ、ちょっと待ってて下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"ehehe, please wait a moment."},

{"lineNumber":106269,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今一番よいお茶を淹れますね♪」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll prepare the best tea right now♪\""},

{"lineNumber":106270,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、あちあちで美味そうだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, hot and looks delicious.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よ、よう、ねーちゃん可愛いな。
茶ァしばきにいかないか？」
時には貴様と茶を飲むのも悪くないかものう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes, drinking tea with you might not be so bad..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と言うとでも思ったか、たわけー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Did you really think I'd say that, fool!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お断りじゃ！　ばぁーか！」
「いだだだ！　なんじゃ、髪の毛引っ張るな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ouch, ouch! What the heck, don’t pull my hair!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ……茶ァしばきにいかないか？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To the Supreme Commander, I have so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沢山、沢山、沢山言いたいことがあります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: many, many, many things I want to say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ望むところです」
「そもそもなんで知り合いしかおらんのだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why is it that there are only people I know here?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、せめて香ちゃんとかアールコートちゃんが
今、すっごくいい気分です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, I feel absolutely great!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: も、もう怒りすら湧いてこない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I don’t even feel anger anymore..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の本当の実力を見せてやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll show you my true power!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、ランス様、お散歩ですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Lord Rance, are you out for a walk?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私もそろそろお使いが終わりそうなので――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m about to finish my errand too—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなことより、ねーちゃん可愛いな、
茶ァでもしばきに行かないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wanna go have some tea or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの顔が真っ赤に。
リンゴーン。リンゴーン。
今、シィルの頭の中で結婚式の鐘が鳴っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, the wedding bells were ringing in Shir's head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ああ……ランス様に、そんな、そんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ahh... from Lord Rance, such, such..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えへへ、ちょっと待ってて下さい。
今一番よいお茶を淹れますね♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll prepare the best tea right now♪"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よ、よう、ねーちゃん可愛いな。
茶ァしばきにいかないか？」
時には貴様と茶を飲むのも悪くないかものう……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sometimes, drinking tea with you might not be so bad..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「と言うとでも思ったか、たわけー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Did you really think I'd say that, fool!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お断りじゃ！　ばぁーか！」
「いだだだ！　なんじゃ、髪の毛引っ張るな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ouch, ouch! What the heck, don’t pull my hair!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ……茶ァしばきにいかないか？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To the Supreme Commander, I have so,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 沢山、沢山、沢山言いたいことがあります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: many, many, many things I want to say.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むしろ望むところです」
「そもそもなんで知り合いしかおらんのだー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why is it that there are only people I know here?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、せめて香ちゃんとかアールコートちゃんが
今、すっごくいい気分です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, I feel absolutely great!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: も、もう怒りすら湧いてこない……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I-I don’t even feel anger anymore..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の本当の実力を見せてやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll show you my true power!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、ランス様、お散歩ですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, Lord Rance, are you out for a walk?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私もそろそろお使いが終わりそうなので――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m about to finish my errand too—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなことより、ねーちゃん可愛いな、
茶ァでもしばきに行かないか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wanna go have some tea or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの顔が真っ赤に。
リンゴーン。リンゴーン。
今、シィルの頭の中で結婚式の鐘が鳴っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Right now, the wedding bells were ringing in Shir's head.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ああ……ランス様に、そんな、そんな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ahh... from Lord Rance, such, such..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えへへ、ちょっと待ってて下さい。
今一番よいお茶を淹れますね♪」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll prepare the best tea right now♪"
